message.body: good morning
Good morning, how are you?
ok. when does school start for you?
Started on Wednesday, I've been at crazy day long orientations since then
how is it going so far?
So exciting and scary..a lot of traditions
wow. i can only imagine. we had this ceremony involving a special coin...
are you at all this week? i'm sure you are very busy...
We have a lantern procession, ha. I will have free time in the evenings next week, but not a lot. We should make it our beeswax to hang out
yes. i am free mon, wed sat sun
Maybe Monday will work, I will be in Lancaster during the day, but home in the evening
What's new with you?
I'm taking a hammock break
sounds nice. where?
Outside the library on campus. We have free time until 4
i'm just waiting to hear about this job...nothing new, really
With the mint?
yes.
I will keep my fingers crossed
thanks. what are you up to tonight? do you have ella?
No, she is at my moms, tonight I'm going to a BBQ with friends of Nate
Do you work?
yes.
Oh bother
do you feel hopefull?
Oh yeah, I feel really ready. And bryn mawr is so supportive. I'm really happy with where I'm at right now.
mighht go to some comedy show with coocnut tonight? are you around?
I'm at my moms until Monday, and then Ella will be here until thurs, that's how I have my evenings free next week
gotcha. how is your mom's?
It's ok, she hasnt contacted any of the therapists I found for her, sort of annoying, but not surprising. How is coconut?
ugh. hanging with him. and 2 of his dorky friends....they're talking about killing mice by kicking them...miss you
Jesus..it's like coconut cubed..I miss you too. No mice will be harmed during our get together Monday
were at tatooed moms....
Holy cats...why?
we areplaying word association...
Oh coconut...
now were talking about bottoming....
Bottoming?
How was the rest of your night with coconuts crew?
it was just the worst. they went to another bar i left. i felt like i really started seemingly like i was disatisfied and judgmental of them...they left
w/o paying their tab...they were all looking to meet girls...i felt like a symbol. plus, the conversation was asinine.
Jesus...I can't imagine what coconuts posse is like. Did they leave you with the tab?
i just paid my portion and apologized to the server.
Wow...wow
i was so mad i wanted to scream
I'm sure, I could feel the tension through your texts. You represented all of the women they weren't conquering
########## gave notice. he is going to be a sserver at#########.
Weird, I can't imagine that is lucrative? I guess it's local tho, married man
he says it will be...
It's the end of an era
we talked about you...
Yikes, what about??
don't worry. i'll tell you tmmrw. it's a good story. he is so warped.
Wowwww, I can't wait. Is he mad at me??
no. he is not concerned.:)
Haha, right..every time Nate mentions his friend ##########, I suspend comment
so weird.
Ive found that in general, people would rather like people than think through reasons for why they shouldn't. On that note, Cory has def written me off
what sshld we do tonight?
I am taking a train at five forty, so I will be west around seven..do you mind coming to my hood?
no problem. my first gamelan practice is today. it ends at 6:30, so i should be near you be 7:00 or 7:30
That is exciting, I can't wait to hear about it..let me know when you are done
are you in the city? i'm on on the highway...
I'm in west Philly
how you want to hang? me and pete are in west phillly...
I'm at Vietnam cafe with Nate,, let's all get together!
We are done eating..
we are at the chaat house. i think pete will go home soon. he's not feeling good.
I was hoping there was a double date...want to go to abyssinia? Nate will go home
sure. were are eating chaat. do you want to come here? right by your house.
Oh sure, we wll walk down, we are paying now
i'm so glad we hung out last night.
Me too..I'm sorry things are so hard for you right now. I got really dizzy this am and threw up. It felt like vertigo.
me too. when will things change? i'm happy you have a really nice boyfriend. do you think the vertigo is anixety related?
I don't know, I couldnt get out of bed today, it was so bad..I used to get it when I was with mike
did you do anything different that may have set it off?
Nothing I can think of. We were definitely both concerned that I was vomiting in the morning...
are you feeling better?
I just threw up again, Nate is out picking up food. I slept all day, it's very strange. I feel fine, and then I change positions or sit up and it hits me
did you stay home from school? sounds lik it might be a bug.
I did, I didnt want to, but literally couldn't. I hope it passes, bad timing
not sure the title. it's from 97...search sarah jessica parker's movies on netflix.
it's just me, destiny and ryan ellis tonight...
A squad
how are you feeling? spending the night planning out pete's days hourly and writing it all down for him
Oh no..Nate and I went to sunn 0))) and then I read for school...I'm not as dizzy today, but still feel a little off
Hi, how are you?
pete had a follow up neurology appt today. the dr said it'ss not typical that people regress like he has... he needs to see a psychiatrist and maybe go
on ritalin...
Did he say why it would happen?
he thinks maybe depression is amplifying his symptons. even though he doesn't feel depressed, he said it cld be manifesting in a different way.
Right, I'm sure there is a certain intrinsic depression that comes with being so helpless. How does Pete feel about it?
i've been thinking about that. maybe some drug cld help him feel better.
It helped us : )
he is scared but the neurologist was adament. if that doesn't wqrk, he will refer him to some specialist outside of the city.
It's not ideal but he can't keep. Deteriorating
right. so it's just kind of sad to have these talks with the dr. how are you? coconut was at sunnn))) too
I know, I thought I saw him..I'm ok, busy already with school
i bet. did you decide on classes? i haven't heard anything about that job. starting to think i didn't get it.
When are you supposed to hear? I've picked my classes, I'm really just taking required classes semester
i don't know. what are you taking? last nightwas############ last night. i closed.
Ugh, yeah, I was at Nates and hunter was drinking to prepare himself
yeah i saw him there. he is so weird.
Yeah he really is. What an epic night for you to be there for. Were tear shed? N
Oh my....
I went to the health clinic, they want me to see an ophthalmologist tomorrow because my eyes arent responding to stimuli like they should
uh oh. do you want me to go with you?
My friend that has done her externship there offered to go, but thank you. There's no appointment so you just go and wait and wait
i am planning on seeing a fringe dance performance of the art museum steps today. it's supposed to be cool. 200 people are in it. are you interested? if
so, can you come?
What time?
there's one at 4 and one at 8.
I'm way into it, I'm o my way to get breakfast now and then the clinic..I will let you know what my time line looks like, I'm guessing 8 will probably be better
okay. i emailed you the link. my yoga teacher is a dancer and recommended it. it's free.
it looks like it will storm.
how was the doctor?
My eyes are healthy, so I have to see my pcp and maybe a neurologist. Nate stayed with me the whole time, it was nice
what's a pcp? do you think the vomiting is related?
Primary care provider, they think so..they think I have benign positional vertigo
you could have ear rocks!
remember anna the surfer from farmicia? she came in last night. she says hi.
I think I do have ear rocks, Nate and I tried to do epleys maneuver.,but it made it worse
i read that there's another solution, too.
Like what?
the semont maneuver. wikipedia says you can try it at home put it's more effective when performed by a professional.
what are you up to today?
